DOC.brief_summary: This post-marketing surveillance study will assess the safety and efficacy of Lastacaft® Opthalmic Solution 0.25% (Alcaftadine) for the prevention of itching associated with Allergic Conjunctivitis as prescribed as standard of care in clinical practice in Korea.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Lastacaft® for the Prevention of Itching Associated With Allergic Conjunctivitis in Korea
DOC.criteria: Patients with itching associated with allergic conjunctivitis. Patients with hypersensitivity to Lastacaft® or its components.
